subjects.queryString: list((y.decode() for y in chain(*[ x for x in w5.h5.root.categories ] ) ) )

universities.queryString: list(chain(*[ [x['address'].split(b',')[0].decode() for x in w5.h5.root.authortable.where( 'author == y', condvars={'y' : y})] for y in chain( *(list(z) for z in w5.h5.root.authors) ) ]))

countries.queryString: list((y.decode() for y in chain(*[ x for x in w5.h5.root.countries ])))
